content.title: Vevlog - waxay ku baro khadka tooska ah ee bilaashka ah | Waa koorsooyin iyo imtixaanno

content.learnIT: Helitaan tayo sare leh oo casharro ah, casharro, iyo ilo ka socda macallimiinta khubarada oo aan qiimo lahayn.
content.learnFromExperts: Ka baro dadka ku hadla dadka ku hadla iyo xirfadlayaal khibrad leh.

content.learnAtYourOwnPace: Ku barto xawaarahaaga adiga oo leh marin aan xadidneyn oo dhammaan casharada oo dhan.
content.coverAllAspects: Koorsooyinka ku daboolaysa aasaaska mowduucyada horumarsan, oo ay ku jiraan naxwaha, ereyada, iyo ku celcelinta wadahadalka.
content.viewAllIT: Eeg dhammaan Vevlog IT-ga IT-ga iyo koorsooyinka

testimonial1.quote: Vievlog wuxuu iga caawiyay si guul leh u diyaargaroobida imtixaankayga IT-ga.
testimonial1.name: Nguyen MinH anh

testimonial2.quote: Barashada Vevlog waligeed ma fududaan oo xiiso badan!
testimonial2.name: Tran Hai nam

testimonial3.quote: Thanks to Viaevlog, waxaan si weyn u wanaajiyey xirfadahayga IT-ga.
testimonial3.name: Le egh hong

content.yourOneStopShop: Maskaxdaada hal-joog ah ee lagu garto xirfadaha IT-ga iyo topik imtixaannada. Helitaanka Kheyraadka Daraasadda Lacagta ee Lacagta bilaashka ah oo la gaaro luuqadaada iyo yoolalka maanta!
